data.title: Mobile Application Development
data.description: Build for China, or Scale for China

tab.title: Overview
markdown: The transition from web-based to app-based Internet use is well under way in China, with 75 million Chinese downloading an app at least once a day. Android is the dominant Operating System, with Apple’s iOS still a viable force in the market. Meanwhile, Android-based Chinese OS are growing market share.

A global advertising agency won the contract for an electronic giant’s app-driven global campaign. White label engagement with WPIC for development of the China version of the app, with the objective of keeping the core messaging and functionality consistent for the Chinese app ecosystem.
